name: Skullz Wordz
description:
A classic Word-Search-Game. Find the ten Wordz in a square full of letters as fast as you can.
Select from different Wordz-Pack with many different Skullz-Wordz to find. The Words will be randomly placed, so you can play the game in endless variations.

For the cultivated Skull-Lover out there – an other fine «Z-App» from Skullz23.
